Class SAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • SAP
  • public class SAP
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements the Shortest ancestral path API the methods provide a way to get SAP in the most lucid way possible in Java

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SAP​(dependencies.Digraph G)
      The constructor takes a Directed Graph as an Argument.
